ygData.subject: Re: [Spells]--Location of
ygData.msgSnippet: I believe I got mine in the Library in Neriak.... ... From: Lute Lewis  To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
ygData.messageBody:
I believe I got mine in the Library in Neriak....
-----Original Message-----
From: Lute Lewis <pbastard@...>
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, June 02, 1999 1:55 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] [Spells]--Location of


I got mine in akanon. You may want to check ocean of tears since you can't go to akanon.

----- Original Message -----
From: Marc & Heather McGill
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
Sent: Tuesday, June 01, 1999 7:34 PM
Subject: [EQ_spell_research] [Spells]--Location of


Can someone please help a girl in need? I am looking for the following 2 Magician spells: 8th level-- DIMENSIONAL POCKET and 12th level--SUMMON FANG. I would appreciate it if someone could please tell me where to go to buy them.
Crimsin { Dark Elf Magician / Rallos Zek }
